Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Bacillus cereus (MIC=100 µg/ml), Bacillus cereus (MIC=6 µg/ml), Listeria innocua (MIC=100 µg/ml), Micrococcus luteus (MIC=50 µg/ml), Staphylococcus aureus (MIC=50 µg/ml), Staphylococcus epidermidis (MIC=50 µg/ml), Streptococcus uberis (MIC=50 µg/ml).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Function: Shows antibacterial activity against the Gram-positive bacteria.

Literature.Title: Host-defence peptides of Australian anurans structure, mechanism of action and evolutionary significance.
Literature.Author: Apponyi MA, Pukala TL, Brinkworth CS, Maselli VM, Bowie JH, Tyler MJ, Booker GW, Wallace JC, Carver JA, Separovic F, Doyle J, Llewellyn LE.
